title: Morning Star
summaries: The Morning Star is a Hardmode, post-Plantera Whip dropped by Blue, Rusty, and Hell Armored Bones in the Hardmode Dungeon with a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance.

Like other whips, it causes <linked>minions</linked> to focus on the last-struck <linked>enemy</linked> and increases their damage against their target. Uniquely, it also grant the minions the ability to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> to struck enemies at a fixed 12% chance. It also gives off blue particles when swung, which generate very faint light.
If the Morning Star hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 5%.
